title: Marsh - Billings - Rockefeller National Historical Park: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Be A Junior Ranger         Junior Ranger Programs are offered at national parks across the country.                                                                      Jon Olender/Rutland Herald  Junior Ranger Program Complete activities with a park ranger that will help you learn about this special national park and earn you a Junior Ranger Badge! The program, good for ages 7-12, is held several times a season. Click here for the schedule of events, or call 802-457-3368 ext 22. It can also be self-guided and is available at the Carriage Barn Visitor Center.  Marsh-Billings-Rockefeller National Historical Park Junior Ranger Book  (pdf 1.9MB)
